name: Note Nebula
description:
A web of notes spun  
Connections in each measure  
Songs, stories begun

Synopsis:
Note Nebula is a unique game that challenges players to play the song they hear on a large set of piano keys. The game's premise revolves around the idea that a song is a beautiful connection between measures and notes. The game's goal is to replicate the notes in the song accurately. Note Nebula is a lovely time for any music lover looking for a fun challenge.

Controls:
Move - WASD
Look - Mouse
Jump - Space Bar
Sprint - Shift
